meanings.def: having the most modern and recently developed ideas, methods, etc.
examples: Scientists are working on highly advanced technology to replace fossil fuels.
It is a technologically advanced society.
Even in advanced industrial societies, poverty persists.
Economically advanced developing countries must make a contribution.
Sweden has a reputation for advanced and stylish design.

meanings.def: at a high or difficult level
examples: He hopes to pursue an advanced degree in economics.
There were only three of us on the advanced course.
special courses for very advanced students

meanings.def: at a late stage of development
examples: the advanced stages of the disease

meanings.def: used in polite expressions to describe somebody as ‘very old’
examples: He was a man of advanced years.
(humorous) Even at my advanced age I still know how to enjoy myself!

idioms.idiom: of advanced years | somebody’s advanced age
